alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Butler (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 10:05AM EST until February 19 at 1:23PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from excessive rainfall and snow melt is expected. * WHERE...Portions of west central and western Pennsylvania, including the following counties, in west central Pennsylvania, Butler. In western Pennsylvania, Beaver. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and other flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1003 AM EST, Gauge reports indicate the Connoquenessing at Zelienople is above flood stage. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Zelienople and Harmony. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
